glsa.title: GDM: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: An authentication error in GDM could allow users to gain elevated privileges.

background.p: GDM is the GNOME display manager.

description.p: GDM allows a normal user to access the configuration manager.

impact.p: When the "face browser" in GDM is enabled, a normal user can use the "configure login manager" with his/her own password instead of the root password, and thus gain additional privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GDM users should upgrade to the latest version:
